name: Mars Jumper
description:
You are an Alien and you have to escape from Mars trought the level while jumping and killing ennemies.

Controls : 

q : move left

d : move right

space : jump

left mouse click : fire

How to play :

 You have 1:20min to escape from this cave.

To win you have to go to the exit as fast as possible, you can kill the ennemies with 5 shots but you can also avoid them. Be carefull ! If you touch them, you will fall of the platform !

Have fun !

This game is a school project developed in 21 hours.

Sources (Sound, images, sprites) :
